yacl3.config.magnetic.title: magnetic
yacl3.config.magnetic.category.general.r: Decides whether Magnetic should only work with the enchantment.
Decides whether players should have to sneak to use Magnetic.
Decides whether Magnetic should also work for exp drops.
Decides whether Magnetic should also work for item drops.
The specified entities will not be affected by Magnetic. You can use both tags and entity ids (resource locations) to define which entities to ignore.
enchantment.magnetic.magnetic.name: Magnetic
